delanonchannel_status_disabled: Deleting messages from anonymous channels is currently disabled in this chat.
delanonchannel_status_enabled: Deleting messages from anonymous channels is currently enabled in this chat.
anon_admin_check_msg_txt: look like you're anonymous admin, click on the button bellow to check your permissions (you have only 2 minutes to click on the button bellow).
antichannelpin_description: Automatically unpin messages coming from chat's linked channel.
antichannelpin_disabled: Anti channel pin for this chat is now disabled.
antichannelpin_enabled: Anti channel pin for this chat is now enabled.
antichannelpin_status_disabled: Anti channel pin is currently disabled in this chat.
antichannelpin_status_enabled: Anti channel pin is currently enabled in this chat.
dban_description: Bans a user from chat and delete the message.
cleanservice_description: Clean service messages (E.g.: When a user joins the chat) from the chat.
cleanservice_disabled: Delete service messages for this chat is now disabled.
cleanservice_enabled: Delete service messages for this chat is now enabled.
cleanservice_status_disabled: Delete service messages is currently disabled in this chat.
cleanservice_status_enabled: Delete service messages is currently enabled in this chat.
error_must_specify_time: You must specify a time after the command. E.g.: /{command} 7d.
dkick_description: Kicks a user from chat and delete the message.
mute_description: Mutes a user in the chat.
dmute_description: Mutes a user in the chat and delete the message.
no_admin_error: You must be an administrator to use this command.
bot_not_admin_error: I'm sorry but i am can't do this action because i am not administrator.
no_permission_error: I'm sorry but you don't have the required permissions to run this command. Missing permissions: {permissions}
bot_no_permission_error: I'm sorry but i don't have the required permissions to do this action. Missing permissions: {permissions}
private_not_allowed: This command can't be used in a private chat. If you need any help, please use the /help command.
pin_description: Pins the replied message in chat. loud can be used to enable notification.
purge_description: Purges the history up to the replied message.
tban_description: Bans a user from chat for the specified time.
tmute_description: Mutes a user in the chat for the specified time.
unmute_description: Unmutes a user in the chat.
unpin_description: Unpins the replied message in chat.
del_description: Delete the message from the chat.
invalid_punish_time_specified_msg: Invalid time specified, the time must to be more than 30 seconds and fewer than 366 days.
